modules.description: Provides monadic operations for sequencing and error handling in asynchronous workflows, including binding, exception catching, and resource protection. Works with Lwt-based asynchronous values and SSL configuration structures. Used to manage I/O operations with safe cleanup and error recovery in networked applications.

Provides functions to prepare, execute, and manage PostgreSQL SQL statements, including parameter binding, result processing, and resource cleanup. Operates on statement handles (`s`) and PostgreSQL value options, supporting both row-based and streaming result handling. Used for executing parameterized queries, batch operations, and portal management in database interactions.

Provides functions for executing SQL queries, managing prepared statements, and handling database connections with support for asynchronous and synchronous execution. Works with data types such as query parameters, result sets, and connection configurations. Used to safely interact with PostgreSQL databases in applications requiring reliable and type-safe database operations.

Manages asynchronous PostgreSQL interactions with safe resource handling and error recovery, combining Lwt-based workflows with SQL execution capabilities. Supports statement preparation, parameterized query execution, and result processing using statement handles and value options. Enables complex database operations such as batch inserts, streaming results, and portal management. Provides monadic sequencing and SSL-aware I/O for robust networked database applications.
